body.p:
New Castle. Nov. 7. 1860
To His Excellency Gov. Ky
Sir

Some 10 days ago, I wrote to you in regard to the case of Jane a Slave for murder of my sister Mrs Porter in Henry County Ky tried & convicted at Owenton this fall. I wished to know when she will be executed -- I am fearful that she will be arrested from the Jail -- There is Sir a great fear that it will be done.
May I call your attention to the letter I wrote a few days ago -- Please address me as Soon as you can.
